entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this evening then becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to periods of rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
